trans-unit.source: . So latter has to be initialized before CMFPlones profile is applied (which installs the index to catalog). At the moment CMFPlone therefore registers the index itself, but plone.app.folder registers it too, which resulted in plone/Products.CMFPlone#313 “GopipIndex registered twice” In tests the registration does not succedd, because plone.app.folder was never initialized as z2 products. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Moved selenium start up and tear down to testSetUp and testTearDown, respectively. This was done to help further isolate individual tests. For example, logging in under one test would require either logging out or shutting down the browser, which is what the selenium_layer will now do under testTearDown, in order to have a “clean” state within the next test. [emanlove]
trans-unit.target: Moved selenium start up and tear down to testSetUp and testTearDown, respectively. This was done to help further isolate individual tests. For example, logging in under one test would require either logging out or shutting down the browser, which is what the selenium_layer will now do under testTearDown, in order to have a “clean” state within the next test. [emanlove]
